ovdesc.p: This is an internal file providing a reference between each Condition group and all Accounts in that Group.
Conditions for calculation and application of interest and charges are defined at Group level and may be overridden with special conditions for individual Accounts.
Only the S(ee), P(rint) and L(ist) functions may be used in this application.

desc.p: Specifies an Account belonging to the Customer specified in field 0.
The numbers of all Accounts belonging to the Customer specified in Field 0 are held in fields 1 onwards, one Account Number per field.
This is an internal, NOINPUT field.
Specifies the Condition Group who owns the Accounts specified in the other fields.
This is an internal, NOINPUT field.
